title: Shipment: Process Shipment Tracking Events for SeCeIT
description:
Description
POT shall process shipment tracking events published by the newly created SeCeIT service. When processing the events shipments shall be mapped to order items of the related O3 partial order.
acceptance_criteria: POT processes shipment create events of the new SeCeIT service
POT processes shipment update events of the new SeCeIT service
